segments.text: Yes , and you must be James . It's nice to meet you at long last .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you too . Thanks for agreeing to meet with us about the new account . My associate , Susan Kim , should be here any minute . Would you like something to drink while we're waiting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . I'm fine . Did you have a nice holiday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . My family and I went to Tahoe to ski and the weather was great . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I stayed in L . A . and it was sunny the entire weekend . We spent most of the time at home but we did go see King Kong on Christmas day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was better than I expected . But , you know , I think I would have enjoyed skiing in Tahoe even better . Do you go there often ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not much . My wife doesn't like to ski . She prefers vacationing where it's warmer , like Hawaii .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't blame her . I really enjoyed it there when we went a few years ago . I'd like to go back sometime soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , me too . Oh , here's Susan now . Let me introduce you .
segments.speaker: S1
